title: News: BBC Sound of 2013 Longlist Revealed
body:
With the end of the year drawing ever nearer, it’s time for the much argued over BBC Sound of 2013 to be unveiled.

Having predicted the rise of the likes of **Adele**, **Florence** and **Franz Ferdinand**, it’s normally a pretty good indication of which new acts will find airplay, and chart success over the following twelve months, however last years list notably missed off 2012’s hype band **Alt-J**. Compiled by a panel of 213 UK ‘tastemakers and influential figures’, the top three acts will be announced in the new year. The longlist features the likes of Drake collaborator **The Weeknd**, LA sister-trio **Haim** and London teenage crooner **King Krule**. Check out the full list below, as leaked by [The Independent](http://www.independent.co.uk/arts-entertainment/music/news/introducing-the-music-youll-be-hearing-on-your-radio-next-year-8397636.html).

**A\*M\*E**

**Angel Haze**

**Arlissa**

**Chvrches**

**Haim**

**King Krule**

**Kodaline**

**Laura Mvula**

**Little Green Cars**

**Palma Violets**

**Peace**

**Savages**

**The Weeknd**

**Tom Odell**
